column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////My date ordered the dry-aged ribeye
column2: his first try of a dry-aged steak
column3: and absolutely loved it. I went a little off the beaten path choosing their spice fried chicken over a steak
column4: and it was the best choice I've made in quite a while. The chicken was juicy
column6: and both served with a delicious gravy and peas combo which was to die for! I will absolutely be ordering it again! Both were large portions
column7: and we were thoroughly impressed with our meal and our service throughout.
